name: Find-Life EP1
description: FIND-LIFE. It is a ship that was launched in space in 2018 and had as mission to find life in another place. On board were three crew members in hibernation. Two died, leaving only the player. But there is one more crew on board. The computer "PT-X" with artificial intelligence.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 SP1+ 处理器: Dual-Core 内存: 2 GB RAM 图形: GTS 450 DirectX 版本: 10 存储空间: 需要 100 MB 可用空间
